sp_widget.template:
Welcome to the My Support Portal (MSP).

With this portal you have access to a support/help area to enable fast resolution of problems with support topics and to find solution tips. If this does not provide the appropriate assistance, tickets can be issued to the Service Desk so that experts can deal with the problems.

Here you can also create a change or orderan IT service. Please note: This site may not function correctly if pop-up blocking is enabled in your browser. Fields marked * are mandatory and must be completed according to the stated requirements.

For a change not related to data, you first need to fill in a CRF that you will attach to the ticket. Make sure all mandatory fields are filled.Else it will not be accepted.

No major issues reported on Global IT applications.

Attn: If you are raising a ticket on behalf of another user, please make sure you enter the user name and their organization in the End User and Organization fields. This is to insure the ticket gets routed to the appropriate approvers.

Please read this useful MySupport usage guide to help you create ticket for the correct service.
